title: Creating a New Ranked Team
body:
I am a Platinum 1 Jungler/All-rounder Looking to create a team to compete in the Open Ladder. Only serious applicants apply - I need dedication. I'm not here to mess around. Open to Platinum and higher players. 
Message me or add me ingame.

replies.body:
Hey man. Want to lead your team under my Esports organisation. Myself and a few friends have launched North Esports - we are growing rapidly and are currently looking for good LoL players. We are currently in the works of getting different sponsors and investments so we're an organisation to be reckoned with! If this sounds good, shoot us a message on our official twitter :)

https://twitter.com/NorthEsportsNE

I am dedicated, I play nearly everyday and if I don't play 1 day I will play the next.
my rank is silver 5
my in game name is : ikssu
my main roles are adc and mid, my best is adc
